column5: Hey folks I was just wondering how many of you have made new committments for the New Year lose weight quit smoking fish more etc.......  Since January 2nd I decided to lose my salesman gut so I had to change my ways and this has been tough.I am not eating much good junk food .I have lost 13lbs so far and it took alot of dicipline to get there.I bring a healthy lunch with me mostly rabbit food but its working.I cut the fat and calories.4 times a week I use my treadmill 30 minutes a day.  January 2nd 2007 I weighed 194lbs.  Today I weigh 181lbs.  Although I miss all the goodies I feel much better and I am less tired at the end of the day.  Like to hear from you Gals and Guys.  I miss chips,Beer and most of all dipping cookies in Milk.  Mike
After last year mine is to fish this year, I am in a holding pattern. Fish, swim or drown I will do something!
Well I didn't make any resolutions, and I've stuck to it  Joey
I am with joey never made any so i guess i stuck to them.

Mike, like you I made the loose weight resolution. Now with type 2 diabetes riding my back I have no choice. After two weeks blood sugar is normal and I’m down a few pounds. Working on the treadmill 20-30 minutes most days helps. Oddly I feel better than I have in years. Due to the med’s I have to limit the beer and wine. In researching this disease I found that there are a lot of things that can be eaten, in Moderation. I can’t chow down half a pizza and a six pack, but I can have a piece or two and a light beer.  So this is a resolution that has morphed into a lifestyle change, but consider the alternates……………
Well I have been really trying to stick to my resolutions, I have stumbled a couple of times but I go right back and try again, I am not the type just to quit, because I stumbled a few times.
YUP Same here none for me never do.........
Stuck to mine last year, fished more than I did the previous year. I'll have to get back to about this years though.  Whopper
Yeah, I'm trying to cut back on my portion sizes.  But, it's also lead to more portions.

I'm sticking to them now, I had two different flus and caring for a house of sick people all Jan.  I don't even want to think about the other flu heading up here.  It has gotten as far as Sudbury.  Paint more, enter shows, I still have to get the nerve up to enter the Worldwide Nature Artists Group.. I hate being rejected.  I have already found more ways to donate artwork for charities and wildlife conservation.  I'm working on the rest.  Pam
well mike i havnt really made one but,i did want to quit smoking...and im gonna do it ..real soon  i hope...by march thats my deadline
Yup, I got one, for last few years it is always the same  To be able to make my NYE resolution one year from now  In about ten+ years I did not brake it yet
